prompt:
I have a tab separated file called "subjects.txt". Read it and tell me how many rows and columns it has. 

here are first few lines of the file(s).

subjects.txt:
ID	dbGaP ID	Age	sex	Race
1	34	63	M	CAUC


response:
```
# Read the subjects.txt file
data <- read.table("subjects.txt", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

# Display the number of rows and columns in the file
rows <- nrow(data)
cols <- ncol(data)

rows
cols
```
Note: The path to the subjects.txt file may need to be adjusted based on its location in your system.
